definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
to tremble/to shiver/to shake/to vibrate/Taiwan pr. [zhan4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Warfarin is the better choice in the anticoagulative treatment of atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 而华法令是目前心房颤动抗凝较好的选择。

sentences.english: Objective To ascertain the relevance of KCNE1 gene and lone atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨KCNE1基因与孤立性心房颤动的关系。

sentences.english: The attack of AF has its fundamental cause and trigger.
sentences.chinese: 心房颤动的发生常有其基础病因和促发因素。

sentences.english: Focal atrial fibrillation treated by circumferential radiofrequency catheter ablation of pulmonary vein orifice.
sentences.chinese: 导管射频肺静脉口环状消融治疗局灶性心房颤动。

sentences.english: Nonpharmacologic atrial fibrillation therapies include surgery and catheter ablation.
sentences.chinese: 心房颤动的非药物治疗包括外科手术和导管消融。

sentences.english: Conclusion The left atrium enlargement is related to atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 结论左心房增大与心房颤动有密切关系。

sentences.english: The risk of stroke in patients with atrial fibrillation is about double that in the general population.
sentences.chinese: 中风的风险在心房颤动患者约一倍，在一般人口中。

sentences.english: The study did observe a small increase in the incidence of atrial fibrillation (AF) in patients who received zoledronic acid.
sentences.chinese: 观察到这种疗法心房颤动的可能性稍有增加。

sentences.english: Methods Electrocardiograms of 100 patients with Af and wide QRS were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析100例心房颤动伴宽QRS波群的心电图。

sentences.english: Studies of the Relations Between Symptoms and Ambulatory Electrocardiography in the Patients With Atiral Fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 心房颤动患者临床症状与动态心电变化的关系探讨。

sentences.english: Conclusion KCNE1 gene is not related to lone atrial fibrillation.
sentences.chinese: 结论KCNE1基因与孤立性心房颤动的发病无关。

definition: atrial fibrillation (abbr. for 心房顫動|心房颤动[xin1 fang2 chan4 dong4])
